SEAN'S BACKGROUND:
Sean grew up in New England before moving to Rochester, NY.
He graduated from SUNY Geneseo with degrees in English Literature and Mathematics in 2016.
While at Geneseo, Sean ran on the varsity cross country and track and field teams, helping the Knights finish 3rd at the 2015 NCAA Cross Country championships.
Here's a photo of Sean and his dad at the 2015 NCAA Cross Country Championships:
![sean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sf585978/SeanBot/master/img/12316356_10207181265603148_8732847039516362770_n.jpg)
Sean also developed several independent reserch projects including %[The Canonicity Project](canonicity.github.io) and %[Intro to Comp](http://introtocomp.org).
Sean is now a graduate student at the Univeristy of Pennsylvania's Annenberg School for Communication and plans on earning his doctorate in 2021.

ONE MORE THING NEWSLETTER:
One More Thing is Sean's personal newsletter.
Each edition features a short critical essay of about 1000 words on a topic related to art, culture, and society.
